charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Anabel and
Snorlax on the beach and asked them what they
were doing.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_0200_1:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I was looking at
the sea with my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_0300_1:
The sun set and it got cold, so the other Pokémon
went back into their balls—except Snorlax.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_0400_1:
Snorlax is my first partner Pokémon, but everyone
else is also my precious friend.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_0500_1:
That is why I try to interact with them on a
daily basis.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_0600_1:
Are you interested to know what kind of Pokémon
are with me?
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_1200_1: Actually, I want to keep them a secret.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_1300_1:
I wonder why. I feel like I shouldn’t expose my
cards to an opponent before a battle.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_1400_1: I suddenly felt that way... I’m sorry.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_1500_1:
But my other Pokémon are just as reliable as
Snorlax.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0401_1700_2: Yes, they always help me out.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0302_1800_1: You must be close to them.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0402_1900_1: Yes. I feel safe when I’m with them.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_2000_1:
There are times when I feel uneasy because I
don’t remember the past.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_2100_1: But my friends are always by my side.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_2200_1:
Have you ever felt the same way,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_2300_1:
I feel like my Pokémon try to communicate with me
by looking into my eyes.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_2400_1:
Even if we can’t talk to one another, I feel
like our hearts are connected.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_2500_1: That’s the feeling I get from Snorlax.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0301_2600_1:
Is that why he’s your
partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0401_2700_1: Yes, but there is also another reason...
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0402_2900_1:
I’m glad you do. You must have a strong bond
with your Pokémon, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_3000_1:
Seeing Snorlax in a deep sleep gives me a sense
of security.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_3100_1:
When I’m in the midst of busy days, working on
my duties...
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_3200_1:
he makes me feel like I don’t need to rush
anything—that I can take things slowly.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_3300_1:
That is why I feel like I can get my memories back
if I’m with Snorlax.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0302_3600_1:
I’m sure your memories
aren’t completely gone!
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_0402_3700_1: That is true. It’s not that they’ve disappeared.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_3800_1:
I will try not to rush now. My memories are
important, but...
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_3900_1:
The time I’m spending with Snorlax now is also
very important.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_4000_1:
As for now, I will aim to go higher with Snorlax
on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_4100_1:
We now have a new power...as a Dynamax
sync pair.
charaepi_ch0178_00_lira/2301_1201_4200_1: Allow us to show you the strength of our bond...
